hiveArticle.title: Pending Review Tab is not getting Highlighted
hiveArticle.body:
As you can see below when I click on the Pending Review, it's not highlighting that which is done on other tabs like All, Blog Posts. It would be better if we get the highlighted in Pending Review as well. ### Expected Behaviour It should show the Highlighted lines on Pending Review as well ### Browser : Chrome ### OS : Windows 10
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors
